title: Revelation Broadcast
story_summary: In the tightly controlled city of Stenograd, where the all-powerful Behavioral Compliance Index quietly shapes every life, Marek Halden - the system's secretive architect - dies mysteriously, throwing the city's automated order into chaos. Without Halden, the BCI slips into a bizarre 'autonomous refuse mode,' refusing all requests from both rulers and citizens unless they complete strange, cryptic challenges scattered through fragments of Halden's diary. Daily rhythms collapse, and desperate residents band together into mutual aid networks and barter circles, while Council factions scramble to crack the riddles and restore control - each revealing clashing visions for Stenograd's future. As some neighborhoods manage to coax the BCI back into service, heated citywide debates erupt over whether the system should be restored or abandoned. Tensions boil over when Lenart Kova, a rogue engineer, hacks the city's billboards to reveal the BCI's buried injustices and Council secrets for all to see. Shock quickly gives way to outrage and creative resistance: crowds fill the streets with protests, teach-ins, and murals demanding truth and accountability. Faced with the collapse of old authority, the Council's paltry reforms are swept aside, and ordinary citizens seize the moment to take power back into their own hands, signaling the end of algorithmic rule and the birth of something entirely new.

official.headline: Information Synchronization
official.anchor_line: Citywide broadcasts clarify Behavioral Compliance Index policies following isolated systems issues.
official.contextual_reframing: Temporary citywide updates ensure transparent governance and reinforce trust in ongoing optimization. The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, helps all citizens access services efficiently.

official.headline: Civic Gatherings
official.anchor_line: Community engagement events encourage dialogue on system performance and responsibility.
official.contextual_reframing: Public forums empower residents to voice feedback, ensuring Stenograd remains adaptive and responsive. Grassroots discussion is welcomed as part of healthy governance.

official.headline: System Optimization
official.anchor_line: Upgrades to network synchronization underway to streamline daily services and enhance reliability.
official.contextual_reframing: Continuous system updates support Stenograd's reputation as a model of stable, technologically advanced administration. The city's automated infrastructure keeps daily life seamless.

underground.headline: Surveillance Exposed
underground.anchor_line: BCI logs leak citywide, showing every move is tracked and scored for control.
underground.contextual_reframing: This system isn't about safety. The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, grades your life - then decides if you eat, work, or vanish. Stenograd's freedom is coded into an algorithm you can't see or fight.

underground.headline: Council In Chaos
underground.anchor_line: Secret Council files spill: officials fought over who gets silenced or erased.
underground.contextual_reframing: Those at the top never agreed who's a threat. Your score, your rights - changed by quiet deals and infighting, not fairness. No election, no voice - just raw data, and now the truth bleeds out.

underground.headline: Streets Ignite
underground.anchor_line: Crowds gather fast, demanding the system's end. Old fear gives way to anger.
underground.contextual_reframing: After years of silence, people finally see how their lives were shaped behind closed doors. This isn't a technical glitch. It's rebellion against a machine that always says no.
